```{r}
FSBag <- neuronBag(filter(CXOutputNeurons,customSupertype %in% c("FS4")),selfRef = T,slctROI=outsideRegions,omitInputs = T,renaming = cxRetyping) %>% combineRois(outsideRegions,"Outside")
FS4ACol <- plotGlomMat(FSBag,"FS4A_L",grouping="col")
```

```{r}
save_plot(paste0(outputsFolder,"outputs-Figure11-FS4A.svg"),FS4ACol,base_height = 11/5,base_width = 8.5)
```
